languages.text: "Ты лишь червь в тени Священного Трона! Предстань предо мной во плоти и сразимся! Или ты только и можешь что трусливо прятаться на задворках чужих мыслей?"
"You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"
languages.original_text: "Ты лишь червь в тени Священного Трона! Предстань предо мной во плоти и сразимся! Или ты только и можешь что трусливо прятаться на задворках чужих мыслей?"

traits.locale_text: "You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of one's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"
"You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of one's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"
"You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"
"You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"
"You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"
"You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"

languages.text: "Ihr seid nur ein Wurm im Schatten des Goldenen Throns! Offenbart Euch mir und lasst uns kämpfen! Oder könnt Ihr Euch nur im Unterbewusstsein einer Person verstecken?"
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nur ein Wurm im Schatten des Goldenen Throns! Offenbart Euch mir und lasst uns kämpfen! Oder könnt Ihr Euch nur im Unterbewusstsein einer Person verstecken?"

languages.text: "Altın Taht'ın gölgesinde yaşayan bir solucandan ibaretsin! Kendini göster de savaşalım! Yoksa tek yapabildiğin, korkak gibi bir insanın düşüncelerinin ardına saklanmak mı?"
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"

traits.locale_text: "Altın Taht'ın gölgesinde yaşayan bir solucandan ibaretsin! Kendini göster de savaşalım! Yoksa tek yapabildiğin, korkak gibi bir insanın düşüncelerinin ardına saklanmak mı?"

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes rien d'autre qu'un vermisseau dans l'ombre du Trône d'Or ! Montrez-vous, et affrontez-moi ! À moins que vous ne sachiez rien faire d'autre que de vous tapir dans les pensées d'autrui, comme un lâche ? »
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes rien d'autre qu'un vermisseau dans l'ombre du Trône d'Or ! Montrez-vous, et affrontez-moi ! À moins que vous ne sachiez rien faire d'autre que de vous tapir dans les pensées d'autrui, comme un lâche ? »

languages.text: «¡No eres más que un gusano en la sombra del Trono Dorado! ¡Muéstrate y lucha contra mí! ¿O acaso te escondes como un cobarde en la mente de una persona porque es lo único que puedes hacer?».
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"

traits.locale_text: «¡No eres más que un gusano en la sombra del Trono Dorado! ¡Muéstrate y lucha contra mí! ¿O acaso te escondes como un cobarde en la mente de una persona porque es lo único que puedes hacer?».

languages.text: “你不过是条蛆虫，在黄金王座的阴影下蠕动！赶紧出现在我面前，和我打一场！还是说，你只会像个懦夫一样，躲在别人的思想深处？”
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"

traits.locale_text: “你不过是条蛆虫，在黄金王座的阴影下蠕动！赶紧出现在我面前，和我打一场！还是说，你只会像个懦夫一样，躲在别人的思想深处？”

languages.text: 「お前は黄金の玉座の影に潜むただの虫けらだ！姿を現せ、そして戦え！それとも、臆病者のように誰かの心の奥に隠れることしかできないのか？」
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a worm in the shadow of the Golden Throne! Reveal yourself to me, and let us fight! Or is hiding like a coward in the back of a person's thoughts all you are capable of doing?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は黄金の玉座の影に潜むただの虫けらだ！姿を現せ、そして戦え！それとも、臆病者のように誰かの心の奥に隠れることしかできないのか？」
